name: TinyCard

auto-width.description: Whether the width of the card is automatically stretched out or not, the fixed width of the card will no longer be set after setting
auto-width.description_zh: 卡片的宽度是否自动撑开，设置后将不再给卡片设置固定宽度

check-type.description: Set card single-select, multi-select, single/radio; Multi-select/checkbox, you need to set the label at the same time.
check-type.description_zh: 设置卡片单选、多选，单选/radio；多选/checkbox，需同时设置 label。

height.description: The height of the card content area

icon-more.description: More button icons, you can pass in an SVG icon object to replace
icon-more.description_zh: 更多按钮图标，可传入一个svg图标对象进行替换

size.description: 尺寸，支持large、medium、small、mini 4个尺寸，默认值为medium
size.description_zh: 尺寸，支持large、medium、small、mini 4个尺寸，默认值为medium

src.description: The address of the image or video

status.description: 卡片状态，支持 success、warning、alerting、danger 4 种状态
status.description_zh: 卡片状态，支持 success、warning、alerting、danger 4 种状态

type.description: 设置卡片类型，支持 text、image、video、logo 4 种类型。
type.description_zh: 设置卡片类型，支持 text、image、video、logo 4 种类型。

v-model.description: The binding value, which is empty by default

events.name: change
events.description_zh: 组件选中/取消选中事件

slots.name: title-left
slots.description: The slot to the left of the title

slots.name: title-right
slots.description: The slot to the right of the title

description: 基础容器，可承载文字、列表、图片、段落等
description_zh: 基础容器，可承载文字、列表、图片、段落等
